pages.text: The Hour is certainly coming, there is no doubt about it. But most people do not believe
Your Lord has proclaimed, “Call upon Me, I will respond to you. Surely those who are too proud to worship Me will enter Hell, fully humbled.”
It is God Who has made the night for you to rest in and the day bright. Surely God is ever Bountiful to humanity, but most people are ungrateful
That is God, your Lord, the Creator of all things. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. How can you then be deluded ˹from the truth˺
This is how those who used to reject God’s signs were ˹also˺ deluded

It is God Who made the earth a place of settlement for you and the sky a canopy. He shaped you ˹in the womb˺, perfecting your form. And He has provided you with what is good and lawful. That is God—your Lord. So Blessed is God, Lord of all worlds
He is the Ever-Living. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. So call upon Him with sincere devotion, ˹saying,˺ “All praise is for God—Lord of all worlds.”

Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I have been forbidden to worship those ˹idols˺ you worship besides God, since clear proofs have come to me from my Lord. And I have been commanded to ˹fully˺ submit to the Lord of all worlds.”
